mapper.select: SELECT WF2.* FROM( SELECT FCST_ID , GU_CD , TO_DATE(FCST_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS FCST_DT , TEMP , MIN_TEMP , MAX_TEMP , FEELS_LIKE_TEMP , WEATHER_DESC , WEATHER_ICON_ID , HUMIDITY , WIND_SPEED , POP , CRT_BY , CRT_DT , MOD_BY , MOD_DT FROM WEATHER_FORECAST WF1 ) WF2 WHERE WF2.FCST_DT > TO_DATE(#{now}, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AND WF2.FCST_ID LIKE '%1200' AND GU_CD = #{gu_Code} ORDER BY WF2.FCST_DT ASC

SELECT WF3.* FROM (SELECT WF2.* , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY WF2.FCST_DT ASC) AS RNUM FROM( SELECT FCST_ID , GU_CD , TO_DATE(FCST_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS FCST_DT , TEMP , MIN_TEMP , MAX_TEMP , FEELS_LIKE_TEMP , WEATHER_DESC , WEATHER_ICON_ID , HUMIDITY , WIND_SPEED , POP , CRT_BY , CRT_DT , MOD_BY , MOD_DT FROM WEATHER_FORECAST WF1 ) WF2 WHERE WF2.FCST_DT >= TO_DATE(#{now}, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AND GU_CD = #{gu_Code}) WF3 WHERE WF3.RNUM <= 24
